citeinfo.origin: USDA Forest Service, Alaska Department of Natural Resources, Division of Support Services-Land Records Information Section
citeinfo.title: Interim Lands Information System (ILIS)

descript.abstract: Data Type: Boundaries ;Federal Land Records for the State of Alaska in alpha format. Contains land records pertinent to federal lands under the jurisdiction of BLM. Updated land ownership/information is not recorded once the land leaves federal ownership. Subsystems of ILIS are: Land Windows - This data base gives the ability to group a specified set of lands together for report information, studies, etc. Survey Subsystem - Gives information on federal surveys. Aerial Photography Subsystem - Provides a cross reference for land descriptions and aerial photographs.

idinfo.accconst: Requestor must complete GIS Starter Kit Data Agreement stating Terms and Conditions for use of Starter Kit Data.
idinfo.useconst: DNR does not recommend use of this data at a larger scale. Greater detail for each layer is provided from DNR, Land Records Information Section, for each data module upon receipt of order.

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.

cntaddr.address: NOAA / AFSC / PMEL, 7600 Sand Point Way N.E.

metainfo.metstdn: Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata
metainfo.metac: Requestor must complete GIS Starter Kit Data Agreement stating Terms and Conditions for use of Starter Kit Data.
